citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30am on April 11,
2024. The inspector called/texted all phone numbers provided, knocked on facility door and waited 30 min. Please contact
your inspector with your current hours of availability
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
This is the first attempted inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30am on April 11, 
2024. The inspector called/texted all phone numbers provided, knocked on facility door and waited 30 min. Please contact 
your inspector with your current hours of availability  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
This is the first attempted inspection. 
 
 
End Section
